item.title: Fredrik Åkesson
item.description: Karl Fredrik Henrik Åkesson is a Swedish heavy metal guitarist. He is a current member of Opeth and is also active in Krux, Monsters of Metal, and Talisman.

item.title: Mikael Åkerfeldt
item.description: Lars Mikael Åkerfeldt is a Swedish musician. He is the lead vocalist, guitarist, and primary songwriter of progressive metal band Opeth, and the former vocalist of death metal supergroup Bloodbath. He was also guitarist for the 'one-off' band Steel, and is part of the collaboration Storm Corrosion with Steven Wilson.
